casebody.data:
JOHN M. HUTCHINSON, JR., by John M. Hutchinson, as his next friend, v. MOTOR TRANSIT COMPANY, a corporation 23 So. (2nd) 383

June Term, 1945

September 28, 1945 En Banc Evan Evans, for appellant. Fleming, Jones, Scott & Botts, F. P. Fleming and Charles R. Scott, for appellee. PER CURIAM:

Affirmed.

CHAPMAN, C. J., TERRELL, BROWN, BUFORD, THOMAS, ADAMS and SEBRING, JJ., concur.
